scripts.start: npm run watch-less & npm run build-vendor & budo src/main.coffee:dist/app.js --no-debug --live --port 3000 -- -t coffeeify -x=vue
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run build-app && NODE_ENV=production npm run build-vendor && lessc src/main.less dist/build.css
scripts.build-app: browserify -t coffeeify src/main.coffee --external=vue | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > dist/app.js
scripts.watch-less: nodemon --watch src --watch src -e less --exec 'npm run build-less'
